item.title: Case Study: ERP Integration for a Leading Nairobi Manufacturer
item.description:
Optimizing Operations Through Strategic Engineering

The Challenge

  • Manual Workflows: Reliance on manual data entry increased the risk of errors and slowed down production cycles.
  • Limited Visibility: Lack of real-time insights into inventory, production, and financial performance.

The Crafted Edge Solution

We designed and implemented a custom ERP integration strategy that unified their core business processes:

  • Centralized Data Hub: Unified all departments into a single, secure platform.
  • Automated Workflows: Streamlined production and inventory management through intelligent automation.
  • Real-Time Analytics: Provided a comprehensive dashboard for informed, data-driven decision-making.

The Impact

  • 30% Increase in Efficiency: Production cycles were significantly reduced.
  • 20% Cost Savings: Optimized inventory management and reduced manual labor.
  • Improved Decision-Making: Real-time insights enabled proactive strategic planning.

item.title: ServiceScout — Local Service Discovery
item.description:
The Challenge

Local service providers in Kenya struggled to gain online visibility. Traditional directory sites were outdated, poorly optimized for search engines, and offered no tools for businesses to manage their presence.

Our Solution

We built ServiceScout, a Django-powered platform that combines intelligent search, geo-targeted content, and SEO best practices to connect service providers with customers actively searching for their services.

Technical Architecture

  • Backend: Django with PostgreSQL, optimized query patterns
  • URL Architecture: Canonical URL structure (/service/city/area/) for maximum SEO impact
  • Lead System: Custom form handling with Kenyan phone validation and spam prevention
  • Admin UX: Customized Django admin with filters, search, and inline editing
  • SEO Engine: Dynamic meta descriptions, structured data, and sitemap generation

Key Features

  • Geo-targeted Listings — Services organized by city and area with canonical URLs
  • Lead Generation — Validated contact forms with real-time notifications
  • SEO Optimization — Auto-generated meta tags, proper heading hierarchy, semantic HTML
  • Admin Dashboard — Full CRUD for services, areas, and lead management
  • Mobile-First — Responsive design optimized for mobile search

Results

  • 2,000+ indexed pages within 3 months
  • 40% organic traffic growth month-over-month
  • Sub-second page load times across all pages

Tech Stack

Django Python PostgreSQL HTML/CSS JavaScript Docker

item.title: Step Up Connect — Youth Growth Ecosystem
item.description:
The Vision: Something Big in Development

Step Up Connect is currently in active development and is poised to become a major ecosystem for youth empowerment. It’s more than just a job board; it’s a multi-faceted platform designed to scale across regions, connecting the next generation of professionals to a global economy.

Our Solution

Young professionals often face a fragmented landscape when looking for jobs, mentorship, and skills development. There was a need for a unified “ecosystem” that not only provides resources but also uses AI to personalize the experience.

Our Solution

Step Up Connect is a “static-first” but highly dynamic platform. It uses Hugo for a fast, SEO-optimized frontend while leveraging a FastAPI backend for real-time features like AI-driven career advice and secure payments.

Technical Architecture

  • Frontend: Hugo with the Blowfish theme for speed and accessibility.
  • API Layer: FastAPI with JWT authentication and role-based access control.
  • AI Integration: Abstracted connectors for OpenAI and Google Gemini to generate job and skill recommendations.
  • Payments: Integrated Flutterwave for secure transactions and monetized mentorship tiers.
  • Infra: Fully containerized with Docker, including Redis for caching and PostgreSQL for data persistence.

Key Features

  • AI Digest — Personalized career and skill updates generated by LLMs.
  • E-Learning Integration — Direct links to high-value skill paths and courses.
  • Mentorship Marketplace — Connecting experienced leaders with rising talent.
  • Payments Ready — Secure billing for premium features and consulting.

Results

  • Global reach — Multilingual support out of the box.
  • Exceptional performance — Near-instant load times thanks to static-first architecture.
  • Scalable backend — Handles high-concurrency AI requests efficiently.

Tech Stack

Hugo FastAPI Python Docker Flutterwave OpenAI PostgreSQL

item.title: Kenya Scraper Platform — Automated Data Pipeline
item.description:
The Challenge

A client needed structured business data from thousands of online sources across Kenya. Manual collection was impractical — they needed an automated, scalable pipeline that could handle anti-bot protections, rate limiting, and data normalization.

Our Solution

We built the Kenya Scraper Platform, a production-grade data pipeline using FastAPI for the API layer, Playwright for browser automation, and Celery for distributed task processing.

Technical Architecture

  • API Layer: FastAPI with async endpoints for job management
  • Scraping Engine: Playwright with stealth plugins, proxy rotation, and retry logic
  • Task Queue: Celery with Redis broker for distributed scraping jobs
  • Storage: PostgreSQL with optimized schemas for large datasets
  • Monitoring: Real-time job status tracking and error reporting

Key Features

  • Distributed Scraping — Celery workers process multiple sites concurrently
  • Anti-Detection — Stealth browser profiles, randomized timing, proxy rotation
  • Data Normalization — Raw HTML → structured JSON with validation
  • Job Management — REST API for creating, monitoring, and managing scrape jobs
  • Export Pipeline — CSV, JSON, and direct database insertion

Results

  • 10,000+ records collected per day
  • 99.2% scraping success rate
  • Zero IP bans with proxy rotation strategy

Tech Stack

FastAPI Playwright Celery Redis PostgreSQL Docker

item.title: JPF Stretch Hub — Fitness Studio Management
item.description:
The Challenge

A growing fitness studio in Nairobi was managing bookings via WhatsApp, tracking payments in spreadsheets, and had no visibility into customer retention. They needed a single platform to run their entire operation.

Our Solution

We built JPF Stretch Hub, a comprehensive business management platform that handles the entire customer lifecycle — from booking to payment to retention.

Technical Architecture

  • Frontend: React with TailwindCSS for a modern, responsive dashboard
  • Backend: Django REST Framework with Celery for async tasks
  • Payments: Integrated payment processing with M-Pesa and card payments
  • Infrastructure: Docker containerized, deployed on cloud infrastructure

Key Features

  • Online Booking — Customers book classes and sessions directly
  • Payment Processing — M-Pesa integration for seamless local payments
  • Client Management — Complete CRM with attendance tracking and history
  • Class Scheduling — Instructor management and automated scheduling
  • Analytics Dashboard — Revenue, retention, and attendance insights
  • Automated Reminders — SMS/email notifications for upcoming sessions

Results

  • 80% reduction in manual booking management time
  • 95% payment collection rate (up from ~60% with manual tracking)
  • 2x class attendance with automated reminders

Tech Stack

Django React Celery TailwindCSS PostgreSQL Docker M-Pesa API
